assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors have no relevant financial or non-financial interests to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was performed in line with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki. The Research Ethics Boards of St. Michael’s Hospital (REB #16–052), Mount Sinai Hospital (REB #16–0054-E), and Sunnybrook Health Science Centre (REB #198–2016) Research Ethics Boards approved this study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Before inclusion, verbal informed consent was obtained from each participant.
